results.title: [Various body movements using simple apparatus]
results.brief_description: A group of British school children demonstrate body movements using various types of apparatus, eg balance beams, hoops, boxes, mats and bars. The teacher stimulates the children by making them vary their movements and using the apparatus in many different ways - each movement flowing into the next.

results.title: [Vacuum review. No. 2]
results.brief_description: Promotional documentary from around 1939 sponsored by the Vacuum Oil Company showing how Vacuum Oil lubricants are used in machinery including agricultural machinery, machinery used in the gold mining industry, a car body building plant machinery, earth moving equipment, cars and motorcycles. Title missing and no credits available.

results.title: [Untitled segment on NAIDOC day: Access News 2000]
results.creator_credit: Pip Starr, Campbell Manderson and SKA TV
results.brief_description: A look at the National Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Day of Celebration. Produced as a news story for SKA TV’s Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne’s Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.

results.title: [U.S. of A.]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Four corners (Television program)”
“Is this the way for future factories?” Documentary about a different sort of factory in the USA - Sol Air Corp - where there are no foremen or organised workforce, no production targets, average wages but many staff benefits including cheap petrol, medical and dental schemes and recreational facilities.
